lead_paragraph: The tour would like to see strong and attractive doubles field throughout the season, such as the one at the BNP Paribas Open, which is an exception.

headline.main: ATP Tour Officials Seek Ways to Heighten the Profile of Doubles Players
headline.print_headline: Tour Officials Seek Ways to Increase Profile of Doubles

snippet: The tour would like to see strong and attractive doubles field throughout the season, such as the one at the BNP Paribas Open, which is an exception.
